testcase.name: create a country
testcase.system-out: Given user sets the response using api end point "https://www.gmibank.com/api/tp-countries" and creates country using "name" and "France".passed

testcase.name: read all countries
testcase.system-out: Given user sets the countries to response using "https://www.gmibank.com/api/tp-countries".passed And user saves the countries to correspondent files.........................passed Then user validates the countries...........................................passed

testcase.name: delete countries
testcase.system-out: Given user deletes a country using endpoint "https://www.gmibank.com/api/tp-countries" and its extension "/57080".passed
